Author: malkia
Content: Isn't there a risk, that someone can (accidentally or not) enter hash-code of someone else's "closure"?

Author: sabat
Content: IMHO, outsourcing to Bangalore was never a good idea anyway. The best talent in India tends to come to the US.\n

Author: acgourley
Content: Depends on a lot of factors, but your pagerank can be a huge deal for many sites still. People deep searching into your content, when they didn't even know they were looking for you, is huge ... if that applies to you anyway.
